description: Low-level, highly configurable endpoint for solving realistic VRP variants at scale. Offers extensive control over operators and constraints but is typically less aggressively optimized than /vrp; with identical settings, it may be slightly slower. Supports up to 3,000 visits and a time limit of 120 seconds for optimization.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifies the expected response media type and API version.
Must be "application/vnd.omelet.v2+json" to indicate version 2 of the OMELET Vehicle Routing API.

VersionedJSON.summary: Use v2 of OMELET JSON API
